abstract: But predictions that Roche is now vulnerable to a takeover from Novartis, which holds a third of Roche’s voting shares, may be premature.
snippet: But predictions that Roche is now vulnerable to a takeover from Novartis, which holds a third of Roche’s voting shares, may be premature.
lead_paragraph: A shareholder pool made of up descendants of the founder of the Roche Holding, which controls the Swiss pharmaceutical giant, has slipped below the 50 percent threshold after one member of the family broke away, a representative for the group said Thursday.

headline.main: Roche’s Bloc of Heirs Lose Majority Vote After One Bolts
